mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (CART_ID, MEMBER_ID, CREATED_AT) VALUES ( cart_seq.NEXTVAL, (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM member WHERE EMAIL = #{email}), SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT CART_ID FROM ( SELECT CART_ID FROM cart WHERE MEMBER_ID = (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM member WHERE EMAIL = #{email}) ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_item (CART_ITEM_ID, CART_ID, PRODUCT_ID, QUANTITY) VALUES (cart_item_seq.NEXTVAL, #{cartId}, #{productId}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT ci.CART_ITEM_ID AS cartItemId, ci.CART_ID AS cartId, ci.PRODUCT_ID AS productId, ci.QUANTITY AS quantity, p.NAME AS name, p.IMAGE_URL AS image, p.RETAIL_PRICE AS price FROM cart_item ci JOIN cart c ON ci.CART_ID = c.CART_ID JOIN member m ON c.MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID JOIN product p ON ci.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE m.EMAIL = #{email}
